abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33539638, pmid33346816, pmid33735881, pmid33734448, pmid33625462, pmid33761886, pmid33735264, pmid33734961, pmid33743869, pmid33743854, pmid33734962, pmid33561010
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.03.29

isBasedOn.name: A novel allele, HLA-C*15:227, identified when typing COVID-19 patients.
